meanings.definition: A device that increases the power output of an internal combustion engine by compressing the air intake.
meanings.sent1: The turbocharger boosted the car's speed on the highway.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic installed a new turbocharger in the engine.
meanings.sent3: The turbocharger decided to take a break after working hard all day.
meanings.sent4: Her energy was like a turbocharger, propelling her through the race.
meanings.sent5: The turbocharger hummed loudly, signaling its efficiency.

meanings.sent1: They plan to turbocharger the old car for better performance.
meanings.sent2: He will turbocharger the engine to increase its power.
meanings.sent3: The mechanic accidentally turbocharger his own car instead of the customer's.
meanings.sent4: Her determination turbocharger her efforts to succeed.
meanings.sent5: The team decided to turbocharger their strategy for the upcoming match.
